languages.text: {n}Последние крохи сознания пса, заключенные в теле живого оружия, рвутся к хозяину. Слишком израненный для такого рывка, Глейто бежит, и собачья кровь щедро орошает холодный камень.{/n}
languages.translation_comment:
спикер пес
камера не двигается, появляется этот куй и новая катсцена с прибежавшей к месту казни собакой

спикер пес
камера не двигается, появляется этот куй и новая катсцена с прибежавшей к месту казни собакой

languages.text: {n}The last shreds of the dog's mind contained in the body of a living weapon compel him to be with his master. Though too wounded to run at full speed, Glaito dashes forward nonetheless, his blood drenching the cold stone floor of the palace.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Последние крохи сознания пса, заключенные в теле живого оружия, рвутся к хозяину. Слишком израненный для такого рывка, Глейто бежит, и собачья кровь щедро орошает холодный камень.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The last shreds of a dog's mind contained in the body of a living weapon compel it to be with its master. Too badly wounded to run at such speeds, Glaito dashes forward, the dog's blood drenching the cold stone of the palace.{/n}

{n}The last shreds of a dog's mind contained in the body of a living weapon compel it to be with its master. Too badly wounded to run at such speeds, Glaito dashes forward, the dog's blood drenching the cold stone of the palace.{/n}

{n}The last shreds of the dog's mind contained in the body of this living weapon compel it to be with its master. Though too wounded to run at full speed, Glaito dashes forward nonetheless, his canine blood drenching the cold stone floor of the palace.{/n}

{n}The last shreds of the dog's mind contained in the body of a living weapon compel him to be with his master. Though too wounded to run at full speed, Glaito dashes forward nonetheless, his blood drenching the cold stone floor of the palace.{/n}

{n}The last shreds of the dog's mind contained in the body of a living weapon compel him to be with his master. Though too wounded to run at full speed, Glaito dashes forward nonetheless, his blood drenching the cold stone floor of the palace.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die letzten Spuren seines Verstandes im Körper einer lebenden Waffe zwingen den Hund, bei seinem Meister zu bleiben. Obwohl er zu schwer verletzt ist, um mit vollem Tempo zu laufen, stürmt Glaito nach vorne und besudelt mit seinem Blut den kalten Steinboden des Palastes.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The last shreds of the dog's mind contained in the body of a living weapon compel him to be with his master. Though too wounded to run at full speed, Glaito dashes forward nonetheless, his blood drenching the cold stone floor of the palace.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die letzten Spuren seines Verstandes im Körper einer lebenden Waffe zwingen den Hund, bei seinem Meister zu bleiben. Obwohl er zu schwer verletzt ist, um mit vollem Tempo zu laufen, stürmt Glaito nach vorne und besudelt mit seinem Blut den kalten Steinboden des Palastes.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Les derniers fragments de l'esprit du chien qui subsistent dans ce corps d'arme vivante le poussent à rejoindre son maître. Ralenti par ses blessures, Glaito se précipite tant bien que mal vers Solomorne en laissant derrière lui une traînée de sang sur le sol de pierre froide du palais.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The last shreds of the dog's mind contained in the body of a living weapon compel him to be with his master. Though too wounded to run at full speed, Glaito dashes forward nonetheless, his blood drenching the cold stone floor of the palace.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Les derniers fragments de l'esprit du chien qui subsistent dans ce corps d'arme vivante le poussent à rejoindre son maître. Ralenti par ses blessures, Glaito se précipite tant bien que mal vers Solomorne en laissant derrière lui une traînée de sang sur le sol de pierre froide du palais.{/n}

languages.text: {n}尽管这只獒犬被改造成了武器，但出于残存的一丝本能，它依然在最后一刻冲向了主人身边。格雷托受了重伤，无法全速奔跑，但它还是义无反顾地冲了过去，鲜血浸透了正义大殿冰冷的石地板。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The last shreds of the dog's mind contained in the body of a living weapon compel him to be with his master. Though too wounded to run at full speed, Glaito dashes forward nonetheless, his blood drenching the cold stone floor of the palace.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}尽管这只獒犬被改造成了武器，但出于残存的一丝本能，它依然在最后一刻冲向了主人身边。格雷托受了重伤，无法全速奔跑，但它还是义无反顾地冲了过去，鲜血浸透了正义大殿冰冷的石地板。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Los últimos retazos de la mente canina alojada en un arma viva lo impelen a estar con su amo. Aunque está demasiado herido para correr a toda velocidad, Glaito sigue intentándolo, manchando con su sangre las frías losas del suelo del palacio.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The last shreds of the dog's mind contained in the body of a living weapon compel him to be with his master. Though too wounded to run at full speed, Glaito dashes forward nonetheless, his blood drenching the cold stone floor of the palace.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Los últimos retazos de la mente canina alojada en un arma viva lo impelen a estar con su amo. Aunque está demasiado herido para correr a toda velocidad, Glaito sigue intentándolo, manchando con su sangre las frías losas del suelo del palacio.{/n}

languages.text: {n}生きた武器の体に宿った犬の心の最後のかけらが、主人のもとへ駆け寄れと彼を突き動かす。走るにはあまりに深く傷ついていたが、それでもグライトは力を振り絞って前へと駆け出し、その血が宮殿の冷たい石床を赤く染めていった。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The last shreds of the dog's mind contained in the body of a living weapon compel him to be with his master. Though too wounded to run at full speed, Glaito dashes forward nonetheless, his blood drenching the cold stone floor of the palace.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}生きた武器の体に宿った犬の心の最後のかけらが、主人のもとへ駆け寄れと彼を突き動かす。走るにはあまりに深く傷ついていたが、それでもグライトは力を振り絞って前へと駆け出し、その血が宮殿の冷たい石床を赤く染めていった。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Yaşayan bir silahın bedenine hapsolmuş köpeğin zihninden geriye kalan son kırıntılar, onu efendisinin yanında kalmaya zorluyor. Tam hızında koşamayacak kadar yaralı olmasına rağmen Glaito, hiçbir şeyi umursamadan ileri atılıyor. Sarayın soğuk taş zemini, Glaito'nun kanıyla ıslanıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The last shreds of the dog's mind contained in the body of a living weapon compel him to be with his master. Though too wounded to run at full speed, Glaito dashes forward nonetheless, his blood drenching the cold stone floor of the palace.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Yaşayan bir silahın bedenine hapsolmuş köpeğin zihninden geriye kalan son kırıntılar, onu efendisinin yanında kalmaya zorluyor. Tam hızında koşamayacak kadar yaralı olmasına rağmen Glaito hiçbir şeyi umursamadan ileri atılıyor. Sarayın soğuk taş zemini kanıyla ıslanıyor.{/n}
